The application has been designed by student Kyriaki Paniskaki for her thesis, under the supervision of professor Athina Vakali. "

Register in order to receive messages and to be able to update the database.
Welcome in Thessaloniki Walking Tours App. Now you will receive messages from server.

Journalist and team manager. She organizes walking tours and she is responsible for the company’s communication and public relations. She never misses the opportunity to take photographic snapshots during the walking tours.
Journalist, radio and television producer with vast experience in the TV reportage and a real taste aficionado, he keeps wandering in the markets offering an unforgettable gastronomic experience.

Archaeologist, art historian, a PhD student and a licensed tour guide, with a subversive attitude and an endless humour. He is a real storyteller and he has a deep knowledge of the city’s history, a history that will lead you to the most unexpected places.

Archaeologist, a PhD student of Byzantine archaeology and a licensed tour guide. He is both a magnificent narrator and an inquiring mind and he has a really unique way of approaching not only city’s history but also city’s stories and urban legends.

Archaeologist and a theatre aficionado, she designed a very agreeable evening walking tour full of theatre stories, secret love stories and urban legends that come right from the Belle Epoque era in Thessaloniki.

Journalist and professor, in charge of promotion issues. Being also fully capable to understand the students’ needs and combine the informal learning with fun, she is a valuable advisor to the educational program of the company.
The team of Thessaloniki Walking Tour consist of
